reason.title: How did I become a programmer?
firstText: As often happens, after school I could not correctly set my life priorities and went to study in a specialty that did not interest me at all.
All this time I felt out of place. Thoughts of becoming a programmer came to my mind from time to time, but I was always frightened by the stereotype that it is very difficult and boring.
Everything changed dramatically when I decided to create my first website in 2018. Since then, I have never stopped programming.
secondText: At the end of May 2019, I finally set my priorities and decided to change my field of activity as soon as possible. At that time I worked for a prestigious company, so this decision was not easy.

To do this, I signed up for a full-stack developer course at GoIT. I wanted to change professions as soon as possible in order to get a more relevant experience, so I got a job as a junior front-end developer before finishing the course.
Since registering for the courses, I have never regretted my decision and in less than a year I received an offer for the position of middle front-end developer.
